item.title: 5 + 1 tips for new IntelliJ IDEA users
item.author: Author
item.description: Why IDEA? It seems like a lot of people have migrated to IntelliJ IDEA over the years. As a long time IDEA user I can attest there are many reasons for that. So if you’re willing to make the jump here are some tips to ease your life. Of course your mileage may vary, and you don’t necessarily need to agree with my opinions. That’s completely fine. ðŸ˜‰ Import Maven Projects like a Pro I don’t really know why that is the case but over the years I’ve found that there is one surefire way to correctly import maven projects, and it is not obvious.
